summary: Best friends Marie and Alexia decide to spend a quiet weekend at Alexia's parents' secluded farmhouse. But on the night of their arrival, the girls' idyllic getaway turns into an endless night of horror.
cast: Cécile de France|Maïwenn|Philippe Nahon|Franck Khalfoun|Andrei Finti|Oana Pellea|Marco Claudiu Pascu|Jean-Claude de Goros|Bogdan Uritescu|Gabriel Spahiu
title: Alta tensión
